TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositionContainer extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.ICompositionService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class CompositionContainer Inherits ExportProvider Implements ICompositionService, IDisposable
type CompositionContainer = class inherit ExportProvider interface ICompositionService interface IDisposable

summary.span: 管理部件的组合。

span.span: Manages the composition of parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象在应用程序中有两个主要用途。A object serves two major purposes in an application. 首先，它将跟踪可用于组合的部件及其依赖项，并在每次可用部件发生更改时执行组合。First, it keeps track of which parts are available for composition and what their dependencies are, and performs composition whenever the set of available parts changes. 其次，它提供了一些方法，应用程序可通过这些方法获取组合部件的实例，或填充可组合部件的依赖项。Second, it provides the methods by which the application gets instances of composed parts or fills the dependencies of a composable part. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 部件可以直接或通过 属性提供给容器。Parts can be made available to the container either directly or through the property. 此 中可发现的所有部件均可供容器用于实现导入，并直接添加任何部分。All the parts discoverable in this are available to the container to fulfill imports, along with any parts added directly. 方法允许将实例化部件添加到现有容器。The method allows instantiated parts to be added to an existing container. 假设组合成功，这些部件将使用从容器检索的部件填充其导入，并将其导出提供给其他部件。Assuming composition is successful, these parts will have their imports filled with parts retrieved from the container, and their exports will be available to other parts. 标记为可重新组合的导入将注册以进行重新组合。Imports marked as recomposable will be registered for recomposition. 使用 方法，部件可以在不添加到容器的情况下填充其导入。The method allows a part to have its imports filled without being added to the container. 如果组合成功，将填充部件的导入，但部件的导出将不可用于其他部件，并且将不会为重新组合注册任何导入。If the composition is successful, the part's imports will be filled, but the part's exports will not be available to other parts and no imports will be registered for recomposition. 应始终释放 对象。 objects should always be disposed. 调用 方法时， 对象还会释放已创建的所有部分。When the method is called, the object also disposes all the parts that it has created. 可以从多个线程访问的 对象必须使用 构造函数设置为 `true`的 `isThreadSafe` 参数进行构造。A object that can be accessed from multiple threads must be constructed with the `isThreadSafe` parameter set to `true`, using the constructor. `true``isThreadSafe` 时，性能会略微降低，因此，我们建议你将此参数设置为在单线程方案中 `false`。Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios. 默认为 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!WARNING] > 决不会导入自身，也不应导入具有对它的引用的部分。A should never import itself, or a part that has a reference to it. 此类引用可能会允许不受信任的部分访问容器中的所有部件。Such a reference could allow an untrusted part to gain access all the parts in the container. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用目录初始化 对象，并用于填充部件的导入。In the following example, a object is initialized with a catalog and is used to fill the imports of a part. 此示例使用特性化编程模型。This example uses the Attributed Programming Model. [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从多个线程访问的 对象必须将 `isThreadSafe` 参数设置为 `true`。A object that can be accessed from multiple threads must set the `isThreadSafe` parameter to `true`. `true``isThreadSafe` 时，性能会略微降低，因此，我们建议你将此参数设置为在单线程方案中 `false`。Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios. 默认为 `false`。The default is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Compose(class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch batch) cil managed

param.name: batch
param.span: 组合期间要包括的对 的更改。

summary.span: 在容器中添加或移除指定的 中的部件并执行组合。

span.span: Adds or removes the parts in the specified from the container and executes composition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是直接在容器中添加或删除部件的主要方式。This method is the primary way of directly adding or removing parts from the container. 将始终保持稳定的组合状态。The will always maintain a stable, composed state. 因此，不需要使用空 调用 即可开始撰写。Therefore, calling with an empty is never necessary to start composition. 无论何时，只要需要对可供 使用的部件进行更改，就应调用 方法。Instead, call the method whenever you need to make changes to the parts available to the . 可以包含要添加的部分和要删除的部件。The can contain both parts to be added and parts to be removed. 对于 的每个调用，重新组合将只发生一次。Recomposition will take place only once for each call to . ## Examples 在这个简单的示例中，创建了三个部件并将其添加到了 中，并检索了一个部分来表明已填充所有导入。In this simple example, three parts are created and added to the , and one part is retrieved to show that all imports have been filled. 此示例使用特性化编程模型。This example uses the Attributed Programming Model. [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer.Compose#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer.compose/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer.Compose#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer.compose/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 `Dispose`后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 返回与指定的 对象中的条件相匹配的所有导出的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all exports that match the conditions in the specified object.

returns.span: 此 对象中与 指定的条件相匹配的所有 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the objects in this object that match the conditions specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现不应将与基数相关的不匹配视为错误，也不应为与基数相关的不匹配引发异常。Implementations should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches. 例如，如果导入只请求一个导出，且提供程序没有匹配的导出或超过一个导出，则 方法应返回 对象的空 集合。For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the method should return an empty collection of objects.

param.span: 需要释放的 。

span.span: The that needs to be released.

summary.span: 从 中释放指定的 对象。

span.span: Releases the specified object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的行为可能会有所不同，具体取决于生成 实例 的实现。The behavior of this method may vary depending on the implementation of the that produced the instance. 通常，非共享导出应该与容器分离。As a rule, non-shared exports should be detached from the container. 例如，仅当 来自在 上下文下构造的 时， 才会释放它。For example, the will only release an if it comes from a that was constructed under a context. 在此上下文中发布，这意味着遍历 对象的依赖关系链，从容器中分离引用并根据需要在 对象上调用 `Dispose`。Release in this context means walking the dependency chain of the objects, detaching references from the container and calling `Dispose` on the objects as needed. 如果 是在 上下文下构造的，则 将不执行任何操作，因为其他请求者可能正在使用指定的 。If the was constructed under a context the will do nothing, as the specified may being used by other requestors. 仅当容器本身被释放时才会分离这些。Those will only be detached when the container is itself disposed.
